definition: to make a report (to a superior)/to give/to endow/to receive/petition
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
rivers and mountains are easy to change, man's character much harder
pinyin: jiang1 shan1 yi4 gai3 bing3 xing4 nan2 yi2

sentences.english: But the fact is that we all have a natural disposition as it was where the voices is concerned.
sentences.chinese: 但事實上關於聲音我們每個人都有一個自然稟性。

definition: of noble character and unquestionable integrity (idiom)
to be content with what one is
to love the common people as one's own children (praise for a virtuous ruler)
full of political wisdom (idiom)/politically astute/with encyclopedic experience of state policy
birds and animals/the beasts of the field and the birds of the air
